document_data.mainbody:
quallocks was a vrock advisor of the demon lord Grazzt in the late 15 century DR.
Circa 1486 DR, Squallocks was at the Undying Temple in Maerimydra assisting Grazzt and the queen of Maerimydra Hledh Hellspawn in the ritual to permit Grazzt to resist Vizeran DeVirs spell.
Squallocks possessed a robe of stars.
